casebody.data:
WINDOW ROCK UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT, petitioner,
v.
Ann REEVES, et al. No. 17-447. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 8, 2018.

Motion of National School Boards Association, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
